entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
